message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to both of us. I understand its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors. To ensure we both benefit from this opportunity, I propose a special introductory price of $750,000 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's value and its potential to meet your needs. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision.
